name: Hacker Simulator v.0.1
description:
You're tired of your boring job, so you decided to quit and start making money being a hacker, hacking minecraft/roblox accounts or things like that...

Just click on computer and start!

NOTE: The game is in Portuguese, but as soon as possible it will have language selection for English.

It's an "old" project that I kept private, but now I've decided to open it and start improving the game again, suggestions and bug reports are welcome!
